data.text: Sûnkhat chu Jisua'n Biekina mingei a minchua, Thurchi Sa a misîr pe ngei lâiin, Ochaisingei, Balam minchupungei le upangei an honga,
a kôma, “Tu rachamin mo hi sin ngei hih no tho, tumo rachamneina nang a pêk?” miril roh an tipea.
Jisua'n an kôma, “Kei khom chong inkhat nangni rekel rong. Ni ril roi,
John han, Pathien rachamin mo, miriem rachamin mo mi a Baptis ngâi?” a tia.
An thenin an inkhala, “Imo ie ti rang? Pathien rachamin, ei ti lakin, itho mo John hah nin iem loi? mi tîng a ta.
Miriem rachamin ei ti lakin, hi mipui ngei hin lungin mi dêng an tih, John hah dêipu ani itia an pom sikin, an tia.
Masikin, riet mak meh” tiin an thuona.
Hanchu, Jisua'n an kôma, “kei khomin tu rachamin mo hi sinngei hih ko tho nangni ril uol no ning,” a tia.
Jisua'n hi chongmintêk hi mipui ngei a rila, “Mi inkhatin grape ruhuon a thoa, a donsûingei kôma a chuon inlo rangin a pêka, asôtzan va châm rangin ram danga a sea.
Hanchu grape ramal zora a hong nîn chu a changtum lâk rangin a enkolngei kôma a tîrlâm inkhat a tîra. A enkolngeiin, a tîrlâm hah an jêma, kut korongin an min se nôka.
Hanchu, tîrlâm dang a tîr nôka, ama khom hah an lei jêma, mâimôk ânsak bita, kut korongin an tîr nôka.
Tîrlâm dang, a inthumna a tîr nôka, ama khom hah an lei mophop nenga, an vôrpaia.
Masuole chu grape ruhuon pumapa han, ‘Inmo ko tho rang ani zoi?’ ka nâi moroitak tîr ka ta, ama chu lei jâ ngêt an tih, a tia.
Hannisenla, ruhuon enkolpungei han an lei mu lehan, ‘Hi mi hih a pumapa nâi ani. That ei ti u, hanchu a rochon ei ta nîng a tih’ tiin an inruola
Hanchu ruhuon pêntieng an kelsuoa, an that zoia. Jisua'n, ‘A pumapa han ruhuon enkolpungei hah imo lo ta nih?’” a tia.
“Hong a ta, ha mingei hah that a ta, grape ruhuon hah a enkolpu dangngei pêk a tih,” a tia. Ha chong hah an rieta anîn chu, “Madôrpa chu tho noni ngei nga” an tia.
Jisua'n a en ngeia, an kôma,
“Tutu ha lung chunga inpal kai chu koichit an ta, ha lungin a dêng ngei vângchu innôi indichit an tih,” a tia.
Balam minchupungei le Ochaisingeiin ma mun renghan Jisua sûr kelen rang an bôka. Hi chongmintêk hih anni demna ani iti an riet sikin. Ania, mipui laka an chia.
Masikin chuminrên an roka, isûra, racham le ranak dônpu Rom Governor kuta an pêk theina rangin mi senkhat misa anga inlêma, Jisua enrichik rangin mi an tîra.
Mangei han a kôma, “Minchupu, ni ti ngei le ni minchuna ngei hih adik. Tute zenuol nei loiin Pathien lungdo chongtak ni minchu ngâi iti kin riet.
Hanchu, Rom Rêng Caesar kôma chôiruol kin chôi hih ei balamin ani mo, ni mak mo? Mi ril roh” an tia.
Hannisenla an boti hah a rieta.
An kôma, “Sumdâr hah ni min en ta u, tu rimil le tu riming mo a chuong?” a tia. Anni han, “Rom Rêng, Caesar,” an tia.
Mahah anîchu, “Caesar ta chu Caesar pêk ungla, Pathien ta chu Pathien pêk roi hana,” a tia.
Hanchu, mipui makunga ite chong achâina sûr mak ngeia, a chongthuon lam hah an kamâma, an dâirek zoi.
Hanchu Saducees senkhat, inthoinôkna omak ti ngâi ngei an honga, Jisua kôma,
20:28: Bal 25:5“Minchupu, Moses'n, tukhomin a lâibungpân lômnu nei senla, nâi nei loiin thi ta rese, a nâipa'n, ha nupang hah luo nôkin a ulienpa richi rang a min nei rang ani, tiin a mizieka.
Voikhat chu, urêng pasal sari an oma, a ulientakin lômnu a neia, nâi nei loiin a thia.
A innik nân ma nupang hah a luo nôka,
a inthum nân a luo nôka, ha angdêna han a sarina dênin an luoa, nâi nei loiin an thi rieia.
Anûktaka nupangnu khom hah a thi zoia.
Inthoinôk tikin te atu lômnu tak mo ai ni rang ani zoi? An urêngin laka lômnûn an nei chita,” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n “Atûnlai mingei an innei ngâi,
Hannisenla, thina renga inthoinôk theiruo ngei le zora la hong ranga lêng theiruo ngei chu lômnu lômpa innei khâi noni ngei.
Vântîrtonngei angin om an ta, thi thei khâi noni ngei. Thina renga an inthoinôk zoi sikin, Pathien nâingei nîng an ti zoi.
20:37: Jôk 3:6Moses khomin ânthârlakin athia ânthoinôk rang roi chu chîmbuk akânga han Pumapa chu ‘Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, le Jacob Pathien’ tiin a rila.
Ama chu aring ngei Pathien ania, athi ngei Pathien nimak, ma taka han chu mi murdi an ring let sikin,” a tia.
Balam minchupu senkhatin, “Minchupu, nu thuona adik” an tia.
Masuole chu ite rekel ngam khâi mak ngei.
Jisua'n, Messiah hih inmo David Nâipasal ani thei rangtie?
David lele han Lapuibua,
Na râlngei ki sirphân
“David lele khomin ‘Pumapa’ a ti rêka, hante inmo Messiah hah David suonpâr ani thei rangtie,” a tia.
Lokongei chong an rangâi lâiin, a ruoisingei kôma,
“Balam minchupungei renga singthei roi. Kâncholiinchuol inhaka lêng an nuom ngâia, bazar muna chubai inmûk, Synagog-a sukmun hoi, ruolhoi jôla sukmun asa ngên ngâi anni.
Meithâingei sum an sâka, mi huongnân sôt tatak an chubai ngâi; ha ngei han an tuong rang na uol a tih,” a tia.
